text: George Homer Ryan, Sr. (February 24, 1934 - May 2, 2025) was an American politician. He is a Republican. He was the former Governor of Illinois. He is a member for the United States Republican Party. His political career was tarnished due to scandals and corruption: Ryan was found guilty on almost all charges and sent to prison. He was released in 2013. Ryan was Illinois' Governor beginning 1999 until 2003. He is listed as Federal Inmate Number 16627-424, and was scheduled July 4, 2013. He was released in June 2013. Ryan died on May 2, 2025 under hospice care in Kankakee, Illinois at the age of 91. ==References== Category:American criminals Category:Governors of Illinois Category:Politicians from Iowa Category:Lieutenant Governors of Illinois Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:1934 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Pharmacists Category:Members of the Illinois General Assembly
title: George Ryan
